articles.author: Paul Reynolds
articles.title: Coronavirus: 'Do not amplify fake news'
articles.description: On social media, people should ask themselves a few simple questions: Who is telling me this? How do they know this? Why are they saying this?
articles.content:
"Right lads I've just got the message there," the anonymous and unverified Whatsapp message begins.
"We've to be in the Barracks for zero six hundred on Monday morning."
And on he goes, whoever he is, in pseudo military style about people needing to be "fed… [+6643 chars]

articles.author: RTÉ Sport
articles.title: Dublin cancel club matches in April due to coronavirus
articles.description: Dublin are the latest county to postpone all club matches fixed for April due to the coronavirus outbreak.
articles.content:
Dublin are the latest county to postpone all club matches fixed for April due to the coronavirus outbreak.
Limerick and Galway have already cancelled their club fixtures next month and Dublin have followed suit 'due to the uncertainty surrounding the resumpt… [+795 chars]

articles.author: RTÉ News
articles.title: Brent falls 10%, WTI below $30 as coronavirus spreads
articles.description: Brent fell by 10% today and US crude to below $30, as emergency rate cuts by the US Federal Reserve and its global counterparts failed to tame markets.
articles.content:
Brent fell by 10% today and US crude to below $30, as emergency rate cuts by the US Federal Reserve and its global counterparts failed to tame markets.
Oil  markets were not helped by new figures which showed China's factory output plunged at the sharpest pa… [+2832 chars]
